metadata.Title: CVE-2017-8105 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
FreeType 2 before 2017-03-24 has an out-of-bounds write caused by aheap-based buffer overflow related to the t1_decoder_parse_charstringsfunction in psaux/t1decode.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-8105` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

freetype2-demos - 2.5.2-1ubuntu2.8
libfreetype6 - 2.5.2-1ubuntu2.8
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: freetype package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.5.2-1ubuntu2.8').
